Game.Name: Skate Boy
Game.Plot: The most exciting theme of the street: Who is the fastest guy on the street? "The Party of the Street Skateboard" is celebrated in malls, avenues and promenades. It guarantees a good view. You need to take as little time as possible. Besides the obstacles along the way there are treasures. Get rid of obstacles with flying saucers. Do you want to be the fastest guy? Keep practicing and get ready to go
